mapper.select: SELECT ur.id, ur.create_time, ur.name, ur.url, ur.description, ur.category_id FROM ums_admin_role_relation uarr LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON uarr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation urrr ON urrr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_resource ur ON ur.id = urrr.resource_id WHERE uarr.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ur.id

SELECT DISTINCT uarr.admin_id FROM ums_role_resource_relation urrr LEFT JOIN ums_role ur ON urrr.role_id = ur.id LEFT JOIN ums_admin_role_relation uarr on ur.id = uarr.role_id WHERE urrr.resource_id = #{resourceId}
